title: yilia-hexo-github
text: Install Hexo123456# install nvm$ curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/master/install.sh | sh# install node.js$ nvm install stable# install hexo$ npm install -g hexo-cli Init Hexo1234567# init folder$ hexo init imchennan# install npm$ npm install# start server$ hexo server# open http://localhost:4000 Link git123456789# install git plugin$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save# edit _config.yml$ deploy: $ type: git $ repo: https://github.com/ichennan/abc.com # deploy to git$ hexo generate$ hexo deploy Create new blog123$ hexo new post "blabla"$ hexo generate$ hexo deploy Add image123456# edit _config.yml$ post_asset_folder:true# install image plugin$ npm install https://github.com/CodeFalling/hexo-asset-image --save# eidt xxx.md$ ![logo](xxx/logo.jpg) Copy theme1234# copy theme$ git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git themes/yilia# edit _config.yml$ theme: yilia Create RSS123456789101112# install rss plugin$ npm install hexo-generator-feed --save# edit _config.yml# RSS$ plugin: hexo-generator-feed#Feed Atom$ feed: $ type: atom$ path: atom.xml$ limit: 20# edit themeAbc/_config.yml$ rss: /atom.xml Other Tips12# hide more$ <!-- more --> Error Handle12345# error# Cannot find module './build/Release/DTraceProviderBindings' code: 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND'# fixed$ npm uninstall hexo-cli -g$ npm install hexo-cli -g
